description: This table reflects the medical data in the In Basket Messages (EOW) master file. Stores a variety of details regarding medications and allergies.

columns.name: MSG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the task record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MEDALT_ERX_ID
columns.description: Stores the Interaction details. The drugs (ERX) ID.

columns.name: MEDALT_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the Interaction details. The type of Interaction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Drug-Drug


Drug-Allergy (Active and Inactive Ingredients)


Drug-Food


Drug-Alcohol


Duplicate Therapy


Dose


IV Compatibility


Drug-Disease


Drug-Lab


Duplicate Medication Order


Pregnancy


Lactation


Drug-Allergy (Inactive Ingredient)


TPN


Age/Sex


Geriatric


Pediatric


Contraindication


Renal Impairment


Pregnancy Related


Pharmacogenetics


Error while checking interactions


BestPractice Advisory


Drug-Study


Indications


Duplicate S&H Procedure Context


Clinical Rule


Monitoring

columns.name: MEDALT_DES
columns.description: Stores the Interaction details. Interaction description.

columns.name: MEDALT_ELG_ID
columns.description: Stores the Interaction details. The allergen (ELG) ID.

columns.name: MEDALT_ELG_ID_ALLERGEN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the allergen record.

columns.name: MEDALT_LPL_ID
columns.description: Stores the Interaction details. The allergy (LPL) ID.

columns.name: MEDALT_LVL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the Interaction details. The Interaction level.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: MEDALT_OVRDRSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the Interaction details. The override reason at an individual interaction level.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: MEDALT_OVRDCMT
columns.description: Stores the Interaction details. The override comment at an Individual interaction level.

columns.name: MEDALT_ORD_ID
columns.description: Stores the Interaction details. The interaction medications order ID.

columns.name: INACT_INGRED_C_NAME
columns.description:
It indicates the inactive ingredient drug-allergy status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Inactive Ingredient Drug-Allergy


not yet Reviewed Inactive Ingredient Drug-Allergy
